metadata.title: CVE-2020-13330 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting versions prior to12.10.13. GitLab was vulnerable to a stored XSS in import the Bitbucketproject feature.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
